data.text: @cspotweet @angusreidorg Because we can clearly see through your bullshit
@MyaAndreasson @cspotweet @angusreidorg We will see when it comes for your family how great you think your ideations are then. Be careful what you wish for, as they say!

@cspotweet @angusreidorg 100%. After 2 years of being mocked, told to "just stay home if you're afraid" and finding out how little people will sacrifice their own convenience has made me struggle to see opposing view points in an empathetic light.
@MyaAndreasson @cspotweet @angusreidorg Murder is murder. Shame on you. Fix yourself because what you currently embody is truly disgusting.
@wohskraps @cspotweet @angusreidorg Not all of them. Maybe just Moscow and one or two other major cities. Relax.
@MyaAndreasson @cspotweet @angusreidorg Why would you openly advocate for murder of innocents?? Where is your humanity?
@cspotweet @angusreidorg I know I'm less able to talk civilly with conspiracy theorists than I was two years ago.

@RobACooper @cspotweet @angusreidorg I think our actual compassion for one another increased, but it became more apparent how low it had been to begin with, so our *perception* of our collective compassion decreased.
